essential.title: Essential
essential.description: Essential cookies are required for basic site functionality. Some examples include: preference cookies, session cookies, authentication cookies, and security cookies.

tracking.title: Tracking
tracking.description: Tracking cookies are used to understand user behavior and improve the website. We use PostHog to track page views
